sentences.en: Aim To discuss the gold mineralization style of Axi , Jingxi - Yelmend gold deposits.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨阿希、京希 — 伊尔曼得金矿床的矿化类型.

sentences.en: And then through supergene weathering mineralization, weathering type gold deposit was formed.
sentences.cn: 再经表生同化成矿作用形成风化型金矿床.

sentences.en: Chromite and / or magnesite mineralization is usually related to the ophiolites.
sentences.cn: 铬铁矿及(或)菱镁矿化通常是与蛇绿岩有关.

sentences.en: Fluoride is an important element in the mineralization of bone and teeth.
sentences.cn: 氟化物是骨骼和牙齿矿化的重要物质.

sentences.en: In area are understanding differences uranium mineralization relation between to those alteration.
sentences.cn: 在与铀矿化和与油气的关系认识上存在一定分歧.

sentences.en: Mineralization in the Blind River - Elliot Lake field ranges from 2500 to 600 m . y . ago.
sentences.cn: 布兰德河 -- 埃利奥特湖北区的铀矿化年龄自2500至600百万年不等.

sentences.en: Objective To study the effect of pulsing electromagnetic stimulation on bone mineralization.
sentences.cn: 目的研究脉冲电磁场对山羊骨延长区骨矿化的影响.

sentences.en: Poorly exposed mineralization is almost certain to be overlooked.
sentences.cn: 露头不良的矿化几乎肯定要漏掉.

sentences.en: Porphyry mineralization, occurred in the Silurian Period, finally formed ore bodies.
sentences.cn: 晚期矿化发生于志留纪, 使矿床最终形成.

sentences.en: Potassic and silicification in all alteration type are most close to mineralization.
sentences.cn: 蚀变以钾化与硅化和成矿关系最为密切.

sentences.en: The apatite plays an important role in Xiangshan rich uranium mineralization.
sentences.cn: 相山铀矿田中磷灰石对生成特富铀矿有着十分重要的作用.

sentences.en: The mechanism of collagen mineralization was studied by ultraviolet photometry method.
sentences.cn: 用紫外分光光度法研究了胶原生物矿化的机理.

sentences.en: The mineralization epoch is the early period of mesoproterozoic Era.
sentences.cn: 成矿时代为中元古代早期.

sentences.en: This is subeconomic mineralization related to minor dyke swarms.
sentences.cn: 这是与小岩脉群有关的准经济意义的矿化.

sentences.en: Wide tabular mineralization can generally be detected more successfully with a pole - dipole or dipole - dipole array.
sentences.cn: 用单极 ― 偶极或偶极 ― 偶极排列一般能比较有效地探测宽的扁平状矿体.
